Package VMF

Class MoneyManager

java.lang.Object
VMF.MoneyManager
public class MoneyManager extends Object
The VendingMachineFactory.MoneyManager class is responsible for managing money denominations and quantities. It allows replenishing money, calculating the total money, retrieving money quantities, getting available denominations, printing money availability, and emptying out the money.

  • Method Summary

    Method
    Description
    void

  • Method Details

    • replenishMoney

      public void replenishMoney(float denomination, int quantity)
      Replenishes the money by adding the specified denomination and quantity. If the denomination already exists, the quantity is updated, otherwise, a new denomination is added.
      Parameters:
      denomination - the denomination to replenish
      quantity - the quantity to replenish

    • getTotalMoney

      public float getTotalMoney()
      Calculates the total amount of money based on the denominations and quantities.
      Returns:
      the total money amount

    • getMoneyQuantity

      public int getMoneyQuantity(float denomination)
      Retrieves the quantity of money for the specified denomination.
      Parameters:
      denomination - the denomination to retrieve the quantity for
      Returns:
      the quantity of money for the specified denomination

    • getAvailableDenominations

      public ArrayList<Float> getAvailableDenominations()
      Retrieves a list of available money denominations.
      Returns:
      a list of available money denominations

    • printMoneyAvailability

      public void printMoneyAvailability()
      Prints the availability of money denominations and their quantities.

    • emptyOutMoney

      public void emptyOutMoney()
      Empties out the money by setting all quantities to zero.
